Package Controllers

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Timed
    public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements Timed
    Two dimensional container of contents that ensure their representation for the user and store positions of contents.
